scenario_text.value:
Man, I sure have come a long way looking for
Agumon.

I doubt he’d have gone much further than
this...
Hm? I think I hear something...
Hmm, hm, hm, hmmm...

(That’s him! What’s he doing humming to
himself out here?)
Hey! Agumon!
Waaah?!
Oh, Takuma, it’s just you. You startled me.
Ha ha, sorry!
But what are you doing out here?
Tadaaa! Take a look at this!
Uh...what is all that?

Well, I was thinking of what might cheer
people up, and this is all the stuff I found!
Wait, is that why you went running off?
That’s right! Remember what you told me?

You said to cheer people up, I should do
something for them I’d like done for me.

So I’ve been collecting stuff I thought would
help make them feel better!

(Oh... Sounds like in his own way, Agumon was
being really thoughtful.)

Thanks, Agumon! I’m sure everyone will love
what you’ve found.
I hope so! That’d make me really happy!
